content:
IBootstrapperBuilder Interface

Definition

Exposes functionality that you must have to create a bootstrapper.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("1D202366-5EEA-4379-9255-6F8CDB8587C9")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsDual)]
public interface IBootstrapperBuilder

Properties

Path

Gets or sets the location of the required bootstrapper files.

public string Path { get; set; }
Value
String

A string value that represents the location of the required bootstrapper files.

Products

Gets all products available at the current bootstrapper path.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductCollection Products { get; }
Value
ProductCollection

A ProductCollection object that represents all products available at the current bootstrapper crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.IBootstrapperBuilder.Path*.

Methods

Build(BuildSettings)

Generates a bootstrapper based on the specified settings.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildResults Build (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings settings);
settings
BuildSettings

The properties used to create the bootstrapper.

Returns
BuildResults

A BuildResults object that represents the results of the bootstrapper generation.
